## Checklist

- [ ] Small/medium diff; scoped
- [ ] `pnpm frontend:lint` / `pnpm frontend:build` (if frontend changes)
- [ ] `pnpm backend:lint` / `pnpm backend:test` (if backend changes)
- [ ] `pnpm ingest:lint` / `pnpm ingest:test` (if ingestion changes)
- [ ] Docs updated (`README.md` / `SPEC.md`) when behavior changes
